DOC.brief_title: Can SIS Using Air Bubbles Replace HSG Fallopian Tubal Patency After Essure Placement
DOC.detailed_description: The gold standard evaluate whether fallopian tube open versus close X-ray hysterosalpingography ( HSG ) . HSG radiologic procedure perform verify placement Essure tubal ligation insert successfully block fallopian tube . However , procedure involve exposure radiation . The saline infuse sonography ( SIS ) direct air bubble hysterosalpingo-contrast sonography ( HyCoSy ) involve radiation do physician 's office . The HyCoSy air bubble device may lower cost , safer alternative procedure show provide similar result tubal patency . This study compare HyCoSy procedure result HSG procedure result woman require HSG procedure receive Essure tubal ligation insert Essure confirmation test . Women randomize receive HycoSy procedure first , follow HSG procedure reverse order . Two independent reader review video result procedure determine degree agreement tubal patency .
DOC.criteria: Documentation normal Pap smear within 1 year prior enrollment study . Written informed consent give Need evaluation tubal status postEssure tubal occlusion Negative urine pregnancy test History unresolved dysfunctional uterine bleeding ( DUB ) . History hysterectomy .
